de.piratenpartei.id.vote

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.piratenpartei.id.vote.Account
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrivateAccount

    public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    Every user has an account. These accounts are represented by this class. The account of the user, who is running the client, has a special account, a PrivateAccount. Account stores the public key and the hash of the key.
    Author:
    arne

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String hash
      hash of the account
      protected java.security.PublicKey publicKey
      public key of the account

      protected Account()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getHash()
      returns hash of the public key of this account.

      Only for PrivateAccount initialization.
      boolean isPublished()
      checks if the public key of this account has been published on the official Account list.
      boolean isVerified()
      checks if the hash of the publick key has been published on the official list of legitimized keys.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        protected void init(java.security.PublicKey pk)
             throws KeyException

        Parameters:
        pk - the public key of the account.
        Throws:
        KeyException
